traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The domovoi's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self, invisibility 3/day each: darkness, dimension door, haste

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The domovoi makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
